sentences.en: A styptic pencil, IE a stick of this, used eg on a cut made while shaving.
sentences.cn: 止血笔（用止血剂制成的药棒，如用于刮脸时划破之处）。

sentences.en: And any gentleman who’s ever beenbackhanded by a lady with her diamond ring should know a styptic pencil willstop the bleeding.
sentences.cn: 那些被戴着钻戒的女士们反手扇过耳光的先生们应该知道止血笔是管用的。

sentences.en: Objective: To evaluate hemostatic effects and safety of the soluble styptic gauze made by hydroxyethyl cellulose.
sentences.cn: 目的：考察羟乙基改性纤维素可溶性纱布的止血效果及安全性。

sentences.en: Tending draw together or constrict tissues ; styptic.
sentences.cn: (有关环境)倾向于压缩自由的.

trans.tran_en: contracting the blood vessels or tissues
